description.author: Michael Snoyman <michael@snoyman.com>, Anton Ageev <antage@gmail.com>,Kirill Simonov
description.synopsis: Support for parsing and rendering YAML documents.
description.description: README and API documentation are available at <https://www.stackage.org/package/yaml>

package-flags.name: no-exe
package-flags.description: don't install the yaml2json or json2yaml executables

package-flags.name: no-unicode
package-flags.description: Don't enable unicode output. Instead, unicode characters will be escaped.

package-flags.name: system-libyaml
package-flags.description: Use the system-wide libyaml instead of the bundled copy
